content.rendered:
Where our journey began...

Where our pioneering journey starts

2004

It became apparent to vegans, Damian and Darrell, that the last meat in most veggie households was the meat that their pets were eating. To alleviate those pet parents of that ethical dilemma, they decided to launch the first ethical and meat-free pet food to be made in the UK.

Independent innovators

Working independently we could apply our knowledge and ethics without having to please shareholders. After a year of research and development we launched Benevo Dog and Benevo Cat as a solution to the ethical problem.

2005

Real alternatives for veganimals

We have continued to invest, develop and pioneer meat-free pet food nutrition for the benefit of all animals

We love all animals, not just dogs and cats so Benevo doesn’t trade in any animal ingredients or test on animals. We believe in pain-free pet foods.

We’re realanimal lovers

2007

We make the first Organic meat-free dog food in the UK

Our organic Dog food is rated 'Most Ethical Dog Food' by Ethical Consumer magazine

2012

Benevo Puppy arrives!
The first vegan food for puppies

We had solved the ethical dilemma for adult dog owners as many customers were rescuing adult dogs, so next came a solution for puppies. The first complete and dedicated vegan puppy food in the World.

Benevo Puppy arrives!
The first vegan food for puppies

2012

Keeping ethics at our core

We carefully select our ingredients nutrition and taste to make sure all the kittens and pups can love growing up in a cruelty-free world

2018

Royal Recognition!

We are recognised in the 2018 Queen's Award for Enterprise for International Trade.

2018

2023

the journey continues...
